stable.change_log:
BravePipe Release 0.28.0-2.4.0

- sync with NewPipe v0.28.0
- fix loading of DownloadDialog quicker on non SponsorBlock platforms
- refactor DownloadDialog -> move most BravePipe related code to BraveDownloadDialog
- make giga downloader CircularFileWriter and FileStreamSAF more robust
- fix multiple entries in navigation menu (donation related)
- RUMBLE: fix postprocessing for Hls streams to mux correctly after download.
          Please test and report here:
          https://github.com/bravepipeproject/BravePipeExtractor/issues/184

- Warning regarding BravePipeLegacy: I could not test this release but it might work
